title.value: MD5 check sum - calculate and check

body.value:
MD5 is a common way to calculate and proof by a check sum, if a file was downloaded correctly. read more here http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MD5.
In the zipped files and folders of unzipped Labdoo images for cloning you will find a a file MD5SUM. In MD5SUM a MD5 check sum for each file is contained. So you are able to check fast and easily, if your download was successful.
check the MD5SUM check sum from a downloaded image
Open a Lubuntu terminal,
navigate to the folder with the files are located cd ...(path) Enter
execute md5sum -c MD5SUM (Enter)
Create a MD5 check sum Open a terminal in the folder with the files and execute in a terminal md5sum * > MD5SUM (Enter)
Windows: There is no internal Windows tool, sorry. If you still using Windows you can install and download a free tool from here http://www.winmd5.com/.
